text: Moma (mmaa) no ntena faako a moteε sεdeε moahoͻden siteε, na monhwε na moanha wͻn amma wͻn ho ankyere wͻn. Sε wͻ’yε apemfoͻ a momͻ wͻn akͻnhoma nkosi sε wͻ’de wͻn adesoa no bεto hͻ.
